setting.error-old-settings-name: ⚠️ Error: Please disable and renable Note Toolbar, or restart Obsidian.
setting.error-old-settings-description: Old settings file loaded ({{oldVersion}}) but latest is {{currentVersion}}

display-rules.name: Display rules
display-rules.description: Define which notes to display toolbars on.
display-rules.option-property-description: If a toolbar name is found in this property, the toolbar will be displayed on the note. Takes precedence over any folder mappings. Set to 'none' to hide the toolbar.
display-rules.option-folder-mappings-description: Notes in folders below will display the toolbar mapped to it. Precedence is top to bottom.
display-rules.option-folder-mappings-empty: Click the button to create a mapping.
display-rules.error-folder-already-mapped: This folder already has a toolbar associated with it.

item.option-file-error-does-not-exist: This file or folder does not exist.
item.option-item-group-help: Select a toolbar to insert into this one.
item.option-item-menu-help: Select a toolbar to open as a menu.
item.option-uri-help: Tip: Use note properties in URIs.

items.name: Items
items.description: Add items to the toolbar, in order.
items.button-add-break-tooltip: Add a line break to the toolbar
items.button-add-separator-tooltip: Add a separator to the toolbar
items.button-new-item-tooltip: Add a new item to the toolbar

name.name: Name
name.description: Give this toolbar a unique name.
name.error-toolbar-already-exists: A toolbar already exists with this name.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: Sets the icon for the floating button and navigation bar (mobile). Requires restart.

show-edit-tbar.name: Show 'Edit toolbar' link in toolbar menus
show-edit-tbar.description: Adds an item to access the toolbar's settings in toolbar menus.

position.name: Position
position.option-mobile-help: Tip: Access toolbars from the navigation bar.

styles.name: Styles
styles.description: List of styles to apply to the toolbar.
styles.help: Customize even more with the Style Settings plugin.
styles.option-default-description: Applies to all platforms unless overridden.
styles.option-mobile-empty: No mobile styles set. Using default styles.

toolbars.name: Toolbars
toolbars.description: Define the toolbars you want to add to your notes.
toolbars.label-empty-create-tbar: Click the button to create a toolbar.

usage.name: Usage
usage.description: This toolbar is used in {{mappingCount}} mapping(s) and {{itemCount}} toolbar item(s).
